hero.text: We are ZingZing — a new generation of snack makers who believe that great taste can be bold, fun, and crafted with care.

secondSection.title: Our
secondSection.text: We don’t just meet standards — we build them into every step. From ingredients to packaging, our promise is simple: safe, consistent, and delicious.

dropsList.dropsText: Produced in an ISO-certified facility under strict hygiene and safety control.
Formulas and processes fully comply with Halal standards.
We work only with verified, qualified suppliers.
We share our certifications openly to build lasting trust.

ensure.title: How We Ensure
ensure.text: From ingredient selection to final packaging, every step of production is closely monitored. Our lab conducts routine tests for safety, texture, and flavor balance — ensuring that every ZingZing snack tastes just as good as the first one.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.text: Each pack includes a batch code linked to our records, ensuring full traceability for every ZingZing snack — from production to its source, because we stand behind every flavor we make.

stewardship.title: Stewardship
stewardship.text: We care for taste and for the planet. ZingZing continuously improves its packaging efficiency, reduces waste, and seeks recyclable materials wherever possible.

certifications.title: Our Certifications
certifications.text: We proudly hold ISO and Halal certifications. To request copies or verify our documents, please contact our quality team.
